content: this legal case took place in the municipal court split and lasted for 11 years and 10 months the cost of the procedure was 2645000 kuna the final resolution of the case was the termination of coownership of two properties with the plaintiffs being allocated 14 of each property and the defendants being allocated 34 the plaintiff referred to as vv filed a lawsuit claiming a share of the property based on a gift agreement the court examined the evidence and found that a previous agreement had terminated the coownership and established the ownership ratios the court partially accepted the plaintiffs claim based on the established ratios
